data.name: DevFest Ranchi 2019
data.description: DevFests are large, community-run developer events happening around the globe focused on community building and learning about Google’s technologies. Hosted by GDG Ranchi, DevFest Ranchi will cover multiple product areas such as Android, Google Assistant, Firebase / Identity, Google Cloud Platform, …
